text: Hi guys, I'm a junior developer based in Chester tasked with learning HubSpot CMS and building a HubSpot website. I use Visual Studio with some experience of Umbraco. Anyone recommend a good place to start?

Hi Gary,
Our discovery kit will help you get a sandbox portal set up.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/discoverykit>

After that I’d recommend the CMS for developers course <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers?library=true>

It’s free and if you follow it to the end you can earn a certification.
